SQL.statement: CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE TS4 PAGESIZE 4 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\TS4' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "BP4" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE TS8 PAGESIZE 8 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\TS8' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "BP8" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE TS16 PAGESIZE 16 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\TS16' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "BP16" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON

CREATE REGULAR TABLESPACE TS32 PAGESIZE 32 K MANAGED BY DATABASE USING ( FILE 'DB2\TS32' 5120 ) EXTENTSIZE 16 OVERHEAD 12.5 PREFETCHSIZE 16 TRANSFERRATE 0.13 BUFFERPOOL "BP32" DROPPED TABLE RECOVERY ON
CREATE LARGE TABLESPACE Apple MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'Apple0' 5000, FILE 'Apple1' 5000)
CREATE TABLESPACE Grape MANAGED BY DATABASE USING (FILE 'Grape0' 5000, FILE 'Grape1' 5000)
